Act2Scene1.speaker: Fleance
Act2Scene1.text: The moon is down. I have not heard the clock.

Act2Scene1.speaker: Banquo
Act2Scene1.text: And she goes down at twelve.

Act2Scene1.speaker: Banquo
Banquo
Act2Scene1.text:
Merciful powers, Restrain in me the cursèd thoughts that nature
Gives way to in repose... Give me my sword.

 —Who’s there?
